description: Start at the Altamont Mb. Trans Canada Trail Display heading east.You are traveling  on country roads riding down and then up the escarpment following the frequent trail markers.  Great View of the surrounding country from atop the Escarpment, and Just before you loop back to Altamont take a slight detour to the east which takes you to an abandoned railway tressel.
directions: From Morden Mb. head north on Provincial Hwy. 432 for 20 km. then turn left onto Hwy. 23 for 29 km. where there is a sign directing you to turn right for 1.6 km. to Altamont.  T urn right on to the main street where you will see the Trans Canada Trail Display.
title: Trans Canada Trail Altamont Loop
